title: Carbon Black Cloud - Endpoint Events
description: This offers comprehensive view of endpoint activity and tracking process actions and device behavior for enhanced security monitoring.

definition.content:
This dashboard offers deep visibility into endpoint activity by capturing detailed telemetry from processes, network connections, and inter-process interactions. It enables security teams to detect suspicious behavior, analyze process reputations, and investigate threats across devices in real time.


For more information, see the [Carbon Black Cloud Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/carbon_black_cloud).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Endpoint Events by Cross Process Action
